title: Universe/Frames/AxesLocalOrbital
description: Configuration for AxesLocalOrbital axes in frames plugin (i.e. based on state vector from center to target, with different options specified by axes)

center.description: Name of point in frames acting as center

target.description: Name of point in frames acting as target

axes.description: Type of local orbital axes, one of the options in AxesSelection in godot/core/astro/Math.
